website_summaries.verdict: Easy to maintain, this sustainable board performs just as well as its plastic and hardwood counterparts.
pros: A large bamboo board that is exceptionally strong and "green."
cons: Uneven work surface due to nature of bamboo
Does not use self-healing end grain

customer_reviews.title: Not your average board
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this product costs more than a basic board. The reason being this is not a basic board. I've needed a board with more area for some time so decided to treat myself with this chopping block. It's thick without being too heavy. I'm not sure if I'd be able to manage a solid wood block of this size as easily as this product. It will take me a bit of getting used to since this is my first "block" style board and it raises the cutting surface quite a bit up. I've included pictures of the underside and also of the side with measurement since it is not on the page currently.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product. Ergonomic excellence!
customer_reviews.text: Ergonomically designed for people like myself with back problems. Alleviates strain and I LOVE this product. It is heavy, but of excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brownsugar57

customer_reviews.title: it bowed a lot, but learned how to control it
customer_reviews.text: the first few months we’re driving me crazy because the board would wobble after each use, but learned that I need to use A LOT of oil and it helps control that. Make sure to pick up a few bottles. Once it’s well-oiled, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: STILL LOOKS NEW AFTER A YEAR ....
customer_reviews.text: I've used this cutting board, daily, for over a year now. This was a Christmas present to myself last year and I knew as soon as I opened the box that I would love it. It was beautiful, and sturdy, and really a piece of kitchen art ... after a year it continues to be beautiful and sturdy and an amazing surface to do prep work on. Yes, you will get knife marks on it but that does not detract from the beauty of the bamboo! I bought the board for use, not display, so marks just add to the character IMO.
customer_reviews.author: blondie

customer_reviews.title: Almost too nice to use
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece. Haven't used it much yet, but so far it holds up well. I Havent noticed and knife marks. Easy to clean. I did oil it well several times before using it.
customer_reviews.author: Niwdk

customer_reviews.title: very well made
customer_reviews.text: there are non skid pads on the bottom of the legs to keep the board from slipping. This is made very well
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, strong, sturdy, stable and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent heavy duty product. Rugged construction and the skid proof feet are just what I needed to keep it stable on our granite counter. Also, it is very attractive. This thing looks like it could last forever, but I would definitely buy it again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with new knifes for my wife for Christmas. She spent weeks trying to guess what it was. It's big and very heavy; make sure you measure space where you want to use it. I don't know anything about cutting boards other than she wanted bamboo. I read what seemed like hundreds of reviews on Amazon and learned that the heavier the board (thicker) the better the review. My original goal of $30 eventually ended up here...oops...but she was ecstatic and the board looks great sitting on the island.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D.

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Cutting Board!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this board to go along with my Island Cart with the Stainless Steel Top. This is a Huge Board! The board is used daily and has provided me with hours of satisfied use. It cleans up easily and is easy to maintain. The shear weight of the board along with the feet keep the board steady and in place. I am very happy and recommend this cutting board. Just check the measurements to make sure you have space!
customer_reviews.author: coach georgeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great big board
customer_reviews.text: Clean by hand Avoid poultry and fish because bamboo holds and slightly absorbs
customer_reviews.author: jeffsarge

customer_reviews.title: great quality, barely any cuts in the board after ...
customer_reviews.text: loooooovvvee this cutting board, great quality, barely any cuts in the board after using for a month. Easy to wash. Love using the three bowls while chopping ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this cutting board
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this cutting board! I actually use it to put my big crock pot on to protect my quartz countertops. It keeps the counter top nice and cool and it is really pretty! Just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: cmabs

customer_reviews.title: I love this cutting board
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these that I have bought, the first was a gift several years ago and it is still in use. This one is for me because I got jealous of the person I bought the gift for...don't judge. I'm looking forward to using it for a long while to come.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus I. Peace

customer_reviews.title: great cutting board
customer_reviews.text: When this cutting board arrived I took it out of its box, placed it over my stove top, laid my head on it and laughed from sheer joy. It covers the top of my stove exactly. The wood is beautiful and warm. I got mine late November/early December, and I use if everyday at least once, and it still looks new. It is easy to clean. p.s. I only use mine to cut fruits or veggies....we are vegetarian. Edit: It is Dec. 2012. I still own and love this cutting board. I'm thinking it will be the only one I'll ever have to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I'm tall and do lots of veg prep...the height is a plus. Excellent quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: ME H.

customer_reviews.title: Cutting Board
customer_reviews.text: Good shape, right height, hollow, not too heavy, doesn't scratch or scar easily. Space underneath to store knives and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Gary E.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this cutting board! Very well made and looks very cool on my countertop! I’m using the recommended mineral oil on it and I know this board will be a part of my kitchen for years to come! Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Noreva

customer_reviews.title: attractive and very useful. Raises chopping surface for comfortable prep area
customer_reviews.text: Well made, attractive and very useful. Raises chopping surface for comfortable prep area. Could use cut-out area on side to facilitate easier transfer to plate or bowl but very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Golfer Doug

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for almost 3 years and it still looks great. I use Snow River Wood Oil on it and after it's oiled, you would never know it's that old. I do not cut meat on it...I use a plastic board that can go in the dishwasher. Just makes me feel better, but I think others could cut meat on it and be happy w/ proformance. Nothing stains it that I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Light weigh
customer_reviews.text: Bought for vacation condo. Like it so much it is going home with me. It is easy to clean and very sturdy. Sits up so you can wipe unwanted items right into garbage disposal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The big boy
customer_reviews.text: Huge, well made cutting board. It comes VERY dry and needs mineral oil. Lots of it. It's also a little softer than I thought it would be. Knife marks quickly. Very heavy. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Wowie Howie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for cutting and chopping. It does'nt slide and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cutting board! But difficult to wash due to the large size.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cutting Board
customer_reviews.text: Big. Bad. Bamboo. I love this cutting board! It was just what my kitchen needed.
customer_reviews.author: stacy gallahue

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy this kitchen piece
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this kitchen piece; nicely made and i used and continue to use Mineral Bee wood conditioner made by Wood from The Hood and it bee very good!
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. McLean

customer_reviews.title: The only board I use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cutting board a while back and just love it. It stays permanently on my counter. I might as well throw out the rest of my cutting boards. I never use them.
customer_reviews.author: Good Girl

customer_reviews.title: Had two of those for a couple years - much better than the cheap ones
customer_reviews.text: Although a bit expensive - worth every penny. Had two of those for a couple years - much better than the cheap ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Friedman

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of time researching a large bamboo cutting board-and this one is well worth the money. The finish on it is incredible, the three little 'catching' containers are of a small but decent size. Just remember to frequently mineral oil it in the first few months (especially up here where we have very dry winters)...
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J Wolfenden

customer_reviews.title: Great Cutting Board
customer_reviews.text: Big beefy board.........looks great, easy to clean albeit a little heavy for the lady of the house. You can cut a lot of veggies on this Baby!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn J. Behrends

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money indeed!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I will use the prep bowls much, but the cutting board is awesome and just the right side to do lots of prepping. A great buy too, at least $50.00 more elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: MIMI Dixon

customer_reviews.title: impressive cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful made, large counter cutting board, quality is top notch, heavy duty looks great
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Barber

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic and well built
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves this cutting board! Looks fantastic and well built!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great Board
customer_reviews.text: Cutting Board holds up well. We use it often. It is just the right size and thickness. Not too many better Boards out there. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Zirlin

customer_reviews.title: Best cutting board on earth
customer_reviews.text: This best cutting board on earth. I give it often as gifts. When I hear a friend in my kitchen say under their breath "wow this is so great", I know what their next gift will be.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Holland

customer_reviews.title: Review for Big Kahuna
customer_reviews.text: Totally strong and well constructed! It's actually a little bigger than I would have liked......my fault.....the dimensions were in the description! However, it is embraced right next to my kitchen sink and is working out beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great  looking  Product
customer_reviews.text: I received this today. Just like all the reviews stated. BIG , well made looks great on my island. Hope it hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the best
customer_reviews.text: Best cutting board hands down. We love the size and for a tall person it is nice to have the extra height of the cutting board. Wouldn't change a thing and I'm thinking of getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Panawek

customer_reviews.title: great board, hard to store
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is bamboo, but you need to season it, as with any type of board I think. The containers are why I bought this board. I am always chopping and I like the size of this board.
customer_reviews.author: Jack McCarter

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting - Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed using this board daily for 2-years now. Not a single complaint, seems to minimize knife dulling. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: da-drum-man

customer_reviews.title: Legs Broke
customer_reviews.text: The legs broke off and I had to glue them back together. They probably won't last very long because of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect prep board
customer_reviews.text: Watched Ming Tsai use this many times on his PBS TV show and finally found one. Just what I wanted and I received it quickly, well-packaged and in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest D. Johnson, III

customer_reviews.title: CUTTING BOARD
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS CUTTING BOARD. JUST WHAT I HAD BEEN LOOKING FOR. IT IS MADE VERY WELL AND LOOKS GREAT ON MY COUNTER.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL BURKE

customer_reviews.title: Long Boards
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Son and his Wife . They were very happy, kinda big but the'll grow into it
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Almost super
customer_reviews.text: Noticeable gouge out of one side where the finishing man jammed the router into the side. the rest is as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo cutting blocks are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice product. The appearance of the bamboo surface on the block we received was not as nice looking as others I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy F.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Cutting Board
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing cutting board. It is really heavy, very solid, and does not move. A little bamboo fuzz the first week, but it is gone. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Feustel Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Size matters!
customer_reviews.text: My wife hated this cutting board because of its size but the first time we carved a turkey she understood why I always say size is more important than longevity. No worries though. With proper lubrications this will also outlast the best Of them!
customer_reviews.author: Mark V.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice quality cutting board, which I have been searching for! First thing I did was oil it as I want it to last. The only thing I do not like is its on legs which at countertop height makes it too high for cutting for me. I am short and those extra inches add a little too much height. It presents beautiful and would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly London

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that is a beautiful addition to your home
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of how well it was built and added usages. It is well put together, looks great, sturdy, easy to clean and maintain, so worth every penny. What really puts this above the rest in my opinion, is that it is not only a great cutting board, but also a nice addition with snacks, appetizers, etc when entertaining. You will be very happy with this purchase. It will also make a great gift idea, which I plan to do myself.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence dalimonte

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: VERY happy with this product. Construction is excellent as is the finish. I rubbed it down as recommended with mineral oil and it did soak up a couple of applications but not overly. It is just beautiful and a joy to chop and cut up food on. My wife on the other hand is not as pleased as I am since it is BIG and HEAVY. But that is because it is a very solid and well built product. I can see myself buying a carving board from these folks in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Bach

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this board as my current one was just too small for prepping fresh fruits and vegetables now that we are eating a healthy meals. This is a great size and looks great too which means I don't have to put it away each day.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Solid like a rock and beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: It’s big and solid and bamboo, can’t go wrong. Put together so very well. I’m putting it on my range when we have company to put things on, plates, or food, or whatever it fits perfectly on my range. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Blondi

customer_reviews.title: what a beautiful cutting board
customer_reviews.text: what a beautiful cutting board. I am so happy with my purchase and can't wait to put it to use once we move into our new home soon! highly recommend if you like bamboo and especially if you are in need of a nice sized board that is beautiful as well!
customer_reviews.author: eskimopatty

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting board
customer_reviews.text: The best cutting board I have ever bought, love it
customer_reviews.author: jackielagata

customer_reviews.title: I really don't think it gets any better than this
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a lot of cutting boards and seen many more. I've never seen a cutting board bigger or heavier than this one. I've had it for a year now and it's still a pleasure to use every time. I can cut 6 different things on it at the same time. If you want the biggest high quality cutting board on the market and price is of no concern, then I don't think there is any way for you to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mbrennan

customer_reviews.title: Big Kahuna is BIG and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have the space for this great board...it is huge...and is EXACTLY what we hoped for. Solid, attractive, great mass, and the best cutting board we have ever had. Love to cook, and this this is the BOMB if you have the room. Use food grade oil as directed and it seals well. A renewable source like bamboo makes it not only good looking and utilitarian, but also a green alternative for our environment.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vastrick

customer_reviews.title: I hate to say I love it but I do
customer_reviews.text: I can find a couple flaw with this board, including it being stringy at first and taking stains too easy but most of the stains I get out and I really just like how bit it is and strong and I guess for lack of a better word awesome. I keep this thing on my counter 24/7 and when it breaks I'll be upset.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P. O'connell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & functional...not too heavy to move either!
customer_reviews.text: Very professional looking, solid, beautiful on our granite counter - husband is very happy with size since he is the chef of the family!
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cutting board for my husband and he loves it. Beautifully made and the prep cups save lots of time. Be aware, it is very, very heavy. At our home it will stay on the counter top.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bush

customer_reviews.title: You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: I sent for this cutting board after reading the description and the reviews. This is my third bamboo board (other two small in comparison but still quite good) and I will never own any other kind. This one is a good size so be sure your kitchen will provide the space; but it is worth every penny. Bamboo is much less likely to stain and scratch. Best thing about it? I'll never have to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: No channel to hold water like other cutting board. Looks nice in a big kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: American Experience

customer_reviews.title: Darn good hunk of wood
customer_reviews.text: 5 hard years in and it rocks! Oil regularly and it should last a lifetime. Feel it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: tavegas

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit With Wife
customer_reviews.text: I know nothing about such things, but ... I am a husband always in search of something for the wife at Christmas. This was a gift she very much liked. It is heavy, stays in place, has nice feet that don't scratch the granite counter, and it looks attractive. The wife likes the utility of it. I gave it five stars as a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mott

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to go with
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality of this cutting board. It’s useful and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa H.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this board as a replacement for a very expensive walnut board that started to split, I contacted the maker of the walnut board asking for suggestions on how to repair their board and got no response. I decided to try this product because of the size and its reasonable price and I have been very happy so far, I also suggest that you also purchase the board oil at the same time if you don't already have it on hand as it is recommended and I agree it is important to keep the surface conditioned.
customer_reviews.author: Berky

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece of bamboo
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece of bamboo. Solid. Heavy. Excellent finish and the seams are...well, practically seamless. I have applied several coats of food grade mineral oil and it looks awesome. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SKG

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cutting board
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product and is the best cutting board I have ever owned. It is pricey, but well worth the cost. I did my homework and found this to be the most appreciated cutting boards by popular review at several sites.
customer_reviews.author: Lracmcd

customer_reviews.title: multi-functional
customer_reviews.text: Washes up nicely, very large. We also use it as a serving tray for cheeses and meats during the holidays. Put toothpicks or fruit in the bowls and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kessler

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Actually I haven't used it yet...but can't wait to. It's pretty big and heavy...need to find a good place to put it. As much as I make stir-fry, this is going to be a great gift! I'm sure......
customer_reviews.author: Blondecardinal

customer_reviews.title: great quality.
customer_reviews.text: great quality....exactly like the one Ming Tsai uses on his cooking show Simply Ming. Having the stainless steel bowls build in makes it so much more convenient than a simple board.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Williams

customer_reviews.title: They are my favorite and last for years and years
customer_reviews.text: I have several Totally Bamboo wood cutting boards. They are my favorite and last for years and years!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Loosli

customer_reviews.title: Looks great too!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cutting board that has held up very well and has been used a lot.
customer_reviews.author: HavingLivedIt,HopefullyLearnedIt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal - I was going to use this to do a built in cutting board but liked the size and heft of this so I left it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Leucadian

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board is huge. Once placed on the counter, it doesn't slide. The bamboo wood is so rich looking. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Got as fit for hubby and he loves it. Adds a nice touch to kitchen counter. Would def recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tam Sev

customer_reviews.title: This board is HUGE!!
customer_reviews.text: Make no mistake this board is huge! Huge. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large island and could not find a cutting board large enough. This worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: China Lewis

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE the BIG KAHUNA!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy cutting board that looks terrific on our countertop. It is well made and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: L's Mom

customer_reviews.title: It IS the big Kahuna
customer_reviews.text: Checked out many sites and many boards before getting this one. I even called the maker for info. Love this board. It is big, solid, and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: SpokaneRod

customer_reviews.title: BIG
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big dude...my wife is petite. This thing is huge...it's almost like a piece of art sitting on your kitchen counter. It's tough to clean at first simply because it's so dang heavy. But once you figure out your own way to clean it then it's not so bad. It's almost like its more of an art piece than a cutting board...but it looks great in our kitchen and it's a damn good cutting board. We've found ourselves using smaller cutting boards for meats and chickens just because this thing is difficult to have to clean too often...but it's a great board. Also, make sure you oil this thing down every now and then so it maintains it's look.
customer_reviews.author: The People's Champ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on special offer/clearance from Amazon. It was described as "blemished" - well, I couldn't find any blemishes, it looks brand new in perfect condition. We like it a lot, as it is HUGE and fits our counter/island perfectly. I would not have bought it, except for the ridiculously low price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rose

product_meta.title: Totally Bamboo Big Kahuna Butcher Block, 24" x 18"
product_meta.description: Size:24" x 18"Prep like a big shot in the kitchen with the Totally Bamboo Big Kahuna Bamboo Serving and Cutting Board! This beefy board is 2-1/4 inches thick with a broad cutting surface of 24 inches by 18 inches— over 430 square inches of cutting and prep space! The Big Kahuna is supported by non-skid feet to keep it firmly in place while chopping, cutting, slicing or dicing. The board is crafted from organically-grown Mosco bamboo to provide a naturally beautiful, durable and knife-friendly cutting surface. This big board will also be the life of the party while doubling as an impressive serving board for charcuterie and other appetizers. Its raised surface makes it easy for friends and family to grab the delicious treats that have been prepared. When it's time for cleanup, the board quickly wipes clean; it should not be soaked or washed in the dishwasher. Backed by a one-year manufacturer’s warranty.
feature_bullets: A heavy-duty chopping block at 2-1/4 inches thick, it can handle the food prep and cutting needs of any kitchen
Doubles as a stylish serving board for charcuterie and appetizers; raised board with feet makes it easy for guests to grab delicious treats
Beautiful flat grain bamboo is also gentle on knives for an ideal cutting and chopping surface; non-skid feet keep the board firmly in place for precise cuts
Easy care: simply hand wash or wipe with a damp cloth; do not soak in water or wash in the dishwasher

Bamboo is better for the environment; Mosco bamboo is an incredibly durable material and it is a renewable resource which grows quickly and doesn’t require pesticides, clear cutting, artificial irrigation or replanting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars144 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
